name: Yumi's Dream
description:
Hello everyone 

this is my first attempt to make a game with rpg maker , i am a novice so i hope

it will be a ok game still :)

-  for the english native people i am sorry already if there is (probably ) some mistakes

here and there in your language ,im open to fix that of course if anyone tells me.

- i'm open to suggestions as long as i can do it with my limited knowledge of  

rpg maker. 

Thanks to Kadokawa for making rpg maker's :)

thanks to Youfulca for the awesome Battle themes https://wingless-seraph.net/en/

thanks to Charles-Michel for his theme "Heart " from pixabay.com

thanks to Juliush for themes from pixabay.com

thanks to VisuStella for free plugins 

small update : 

- fixed a wall i could walk through at the abandonned temple entrance

- i put a warning before you reach the boss so you can save if needed ( level 5 recommended but if its too hard then i'll weaken it )

- added a mac version

the story is about  Yumi , a 18 years old girl who love anime and manga,

 after a long day of classes

  she wanders around the school  before going back home ,

at home her big sister welcome her and she wants to take a little nap 

before the dinner will be ready,

she quickly fall asleep and starts dreaming about her favorite anime  :)
